title: In Praise of Stupid Song Lyrics
author: Not specified in the provided text.
date_published: Not specified in the provided text.
dek: This article distinguishes between "bad lyrics" and "stupid lyrics," arguing that while bad lyrics are pretentious and poorly executed attempts at profundity, stupid lyrics, through their ineptitude, authentically capture the clumsiness of human life.  The author uses the Shins' lyric "You're the girl on the wing of a barnstormer" as an example of bad lyrics, contrasting it with the directness they prefer.
